articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Total solar eclipse April 2024: 10 of the biggest cities within in the path of totality - Space.com
articles.description: On April 8, 2024, over 31 million people in North America will witness a total solar eclipse, around a third of them in just 10 cities.
articles.content:

articles.author: Jamie Carter
articles.title: Quadrantid meteor shower 2024: The year's 1st meteor shower blazes over North America on Jan. 3 - Livescience.com
articles.description: Up to 120 shooting stars per hour could be visible during a brief peak of the Quadrantid meteor shower — the year's first meteor shower, coming to North America Jan. 3 and 4.
articles.content:
The Quadrantid meteor shower will peak this week and could bring up to 120 shooting stars per hour to the night sky.
It has the potential to be the strongest meteor shower of 2024, according to the … [+2051 chars]
